pkgmetadata.longdescription: Randomized Phase II Oncology Trials with Bernoulli Outcomes // Provides functions to assist with the design of randomized comparative phase II oncology trials that assume their primary outcome variable is Bernoulli distributed. Specifically, support is provided to (a) perform a sample size calculation when using one of several published designs, (b) evaluate the operating characteristics of a given design (both analytically and via simulation), and (c) produce informative plots.
